text:
Reginald James Watson AM (27 August 1926 – 8 October 2019), as Reg Watson was an Australian retired television producer and writer. He was best known for creating soap operas like "Prisoner" and "Neighbours". He retired in 1992.
Watson was honored with Order of Australia in 2010.
He died on 8 October 2019 at the age of 93.
